Jul 2020 - Present (10 months +)
At Omron, I work at designing, developing and executing our international product plus service energy
strategy and business models composed of, but not limited to:
 
• Prospecting of energy and electric mobility companies and technologies for corporate alliances.
• Smart PV inverters and module-level power electronics innovation for the residential sector.
• Behind-the-meter storage and chemistry selection of the most suitable options for our residential
portfolio.
• Electric vehicle chargers and analysis of business models for both V1G and V2G charging
infrastructure.
• Aggregation of the demand of distributed energy prosumers.
• Creation of solar communities and resource management thorugh virtual power plants and dedicated
hardware.

country.
• Analysis of charging technologies to improve the battery lifespan and performance (pulse charging,
machine learning, etc.)
• IoT applications for smart buildings: improvement of people management in spaces and optimization
of electricity consumption.

inverters and more than 50 000 residential batteries behind the meter accounting for more than 100
